mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_NAME, MAIN_POSTER, POSTER, DESC_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(EVENT_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd') EVENT_START, TO_CHAR(EVENT_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd') EVENT_END FROM EVENT

SELECT a.* ,(SELECT desc_detail FROM EVENT e WHERE event_id = a.event_id) AS desc_detail FROM ( WITH HASHTABLES AS ( SELECT hc.CONN_ID, hc.BOARD_ID, h.HASH_ID, h.HASH_NAME FROM HASHTAGS_CONN hc INNER JOIN HASHTAGS h ON hc.HASH_ID = h.HASH_ID ) SELECT DISTINCT EVENT_ID, e.BOARD_ID, EVENT_NAME, MAIN_POSTER, POSTER, TO_CHAR(EVENT_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd') EVENT_START, TO_CHAR(EVENT_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd') EVENT_END, LISTAGG( DISTINCT h.HASH_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY e.event_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY e.event_ID) AS hashnames FROM EVENT e INNER JOIN HASHTABLES h ON e.event_id = h.CONN_ID AND e.BOARD_ID = h.BOARD_ID WHERE EVENT_ID = #{event_id} ) a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT (EVENT_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_NAME, MAIN_POSTER, POSTER, DESC_DETAIL, EVENT_START, EVENT_END) VALUES( EVENT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 60, #{event_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{main_poster, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poster, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc_detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{event_start, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{event_end, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_NAME = #{event_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_POSTER = #{main_poster ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTER = #{poster, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC_DETAIL = #{desc_detail, jdbcType=CLOB}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, EVENT_START = #{event_start, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_END = #{event_end, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE EVENT_ID = #{event_id}
